meanings.definition: The quality or state of being querulous.
meanings.sent1: Her constant querulousness made it difficult to have a peaceful conversation.
meanings.sent2: The teacher grew tired of the student's querulousness about the homework assignment.
meanings.sent3: The querulousness of the toddler over not getting a second cookie was both amusing and frustrating.
meanings.sent4: The querulousness of the old car engine sounded like a tired old man grumbling.
meanings.sent5: The querulousness of the cat meowing incessantly at the closed door was impossible to ignore.

meanings.sent1: His constant querulousness about the weather was starting to annoy everyone.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't help but roll her eyes at his querulousness over the smallest inconveniences.
meanings.sent3: The querulousness of the dog barking at the mailman every morning became a daily routine.
meanings.sent4: The querulousness of the leaky faucet was like a never-ending drip of complaints in the house.
meanings.sent5: The querulousness of the baby crying for attention could be heard throughout the entire house.
